title: Explore the ruins
content:
oded figure emerged from one of the sarcophagi we opened. Seems like it has something to say. The hooded figure said he would see us again soon. He was probably the ruins' greatest secret, but there's no harm in checking for more valuables.

Explore the Ruins Walkthrough

If you are a rogue, you can lockpick the door behind Shadowheart (Where you first meet her). But you may want to spend more time exploring the beach before entering the ruins. Without enough companions, it's gonna be very chall
